topic.title: USE INDEX clause
topic.shortdesc: The USE INDEX clause supplies index hints that specify an index to use as part of the query execution.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: The USE INDEX clause supplies index hints that specify an index to use as part of the query execution. The query engine attempts to use the specified index if the index is applicable for the query.

conbody.section:
SyntaxSELECT field_clause FROM keyspace_ref USE INDEX "(" index_clause [ USING GSI ], index_clause2 [ USING GSI ]* ")"
UPDATE keyspace_ref USE INDEX index_clause SET set_clause WHERE where_clause
DELETE FROM keyspace_ref USE INDEX index_clause WHERE where_clause For syntax details, see UPDATE and DELETE.

dlentry.dd: The field or multiple fields in your projection.
The name of your bucket or keyspace.
The name of your existing index that will be used.
The expression of the field or fields to be updated.
The expression to filter which documents to be included in the projection.

section.title: Examples
section.p: Example 1: USE INDEX with SELECT to specify an index. First, make the index to be used:CREATE INDEX idx1 ON `travel-sample`(airline) USING GSI;Then, make a query using the above index:SELECT sourceairport, airline FROM `travel-sample` USE INDEX (idx1 USING GSI) WHERE airline > "M";Results:[ { "airline": "M5", "sourceairport": "BFI" }, { "airline": "M5", "sourceairport": "BFI" }, { "airline": "M5", "sourceairport": "CLM" }, ...Explain Plan:{ "plan": { "#operator": "Sequence", "~children": [ { "#operator": "IndexScan3", "index": "idx1", ...Example 2: USE INDEX with UPDATE to change all hotel check-out times to be 12pm. First, create the index:CREATE INDEX idx2 ON `travel-sample`(type);Then run the update query with the above index:UPDATE `travel-sample` USE INDEX(idx2) SET checkout = "12pm" WHERE type = "hotel";Example 3: USE INDEX with DELETE to remove all hotel documents. First, create the index:CREATE INDEX idx3 ON 'travel-sample`(type);Then run the delete query with the above index:DELETE FROM `travel-sample` USE INDEX(idx3) WHERE type = "hotel";
